00064 #ifndef INCLUDE_CONFIG_H        /* USED TO CHECK THAT THERE IS SOME CHIP DEFINED */
00065 #define INCLUDE_CONFIG_H
00066 
00067 #define MB90F553A       
00071 /*      Based on chip information, define certain constants here.
00072         These are used mostly in ethernet.c to make it as 
00073         platform independent as possible. For now only one */
00074         
00075 /* what to include ? */
00076 #ifdef MB90F553A
00077 
00078 #include <inet/arch/mb90f553a/mb90550.h>
00079 
00080 /* what to put to data direction registers to make them in/out */
00081 
00082 #define DDR_OUT 0xFF    
00085 #define DDR_IN  0x00    
00089 /* ISA & Chip Specific bus signals      */
00090 
00091 #define         DATABUS                 PDR1            
00094 #define         DATADIR                 DDR1            
00097 #define         ADRBUS                  PDR2            
00100 #define         IOW                             PDR2_P26        
00101 #define         IOR                             PDR2_P25        
00102 #define         IOCHRDY                 PDR0_P05        
00104 #define         RESETPIN_NE2000 PDR2_P27        
00106 #endif  /* mb90f553a */
00107

00109 #endif
